mapper.select: SELECT e.`id`, e.`exam_id`, e.`staff_id`, e.`exam_count`, e.`exam_time`, e.`exam_result`, e.`exam_timeC` FROM `exam_record` e INNER JOIN `exam` r ON e.`exam_id`=r.`id` INNER JOIN `staff` s ON e.`staff_id`=s.`id` ORDER BY e.`exam_time` DESC limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT e.`id`, e.`exam_id`, e.`staff_id`, e.`exam_count`, e.`exam_time`, e.`exam_result`, e.`exam_timeC`,r.`exam_name` as `exam_name`,s.`staff_name` as `staff_name` FROM `exam_record` e INNER JOIN `exam` r ON e.`exam_id`=r.`id` INNER JOIN `staff` s ON e.`staff_id`=s.`id` WHERE e.`staff_id`=#{staff_id} ORDER BY e.`exam_time` DESC

SELECT e.`id`, e.`exam_id`, e.`staff_id`, e.`exam_count`, e.`exam_time`, e.`exam_result`, e.`exam_timeC`,r.`exam_name` as `exam_name`,s.`staff_name` as `staff_name` FROM `exam_record` e INNER JOIN `exam` r ON e.`exam_id`=r.`id` INNER JOIN `staff` s ON e.`staff_id`=s.`id` WHERE e.`staff_id`=#{staff_id} ORDER BY e.`exam_time` DESC
